column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Very good ramen in a pretty authentic and trendy atmosphere. I liked that there were so many flavors of ramen to choose from
column2: with the ability to add extras! We had the Jinya bun which is braised pork on a sweet bun as an appetizer and then Jinya Tonkotsu Black and the spicy chicken ramen. Make sure you add the egg! Good atmosphere for date night
column4: it is very filling! We will be back!
